TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit HttpServerUtilityBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 充当类的基类，前者提供用于处理 Web 请求的 helper 方法。

span.span: Serves as the base class for classes that provide helper methods for processing Web requests.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是一个抽象类，包含相同的成员类。The class is an abstract class that contains the same members as the class. 类，可创建如下所示的派生的类类，但你可以自定义并使用 ASP.NET 管道外部。The class enables you to create derived classes that are like the class, but that you can customize and that work outside the ASP.NET pipeline. 在执行单元测试时，通常使用派生的类以实现具有可满足你正在测试的方案的自定义行为的成员。When you perform unit testing, you typically use a derived class to implement members with customized behavior that fulfills the scenario you are testing. 类是从 类派生的。The class derives from the class. 类用作的包装器类。The class serves as a wrapper for the class. 在运行时，您通常使用的实例类调用的成员对象。At run time, you typically use an instance of the class to call members of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: protected HttpServerUtilityBase ();
.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Protected Sub New ()
protected: HttpServerUtilityBase();

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，在当前进程的上下文中执行指定虚拟路径的处理程序，并使用 实例捕获已执行处理程序的输出。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, executes the handler for the specified virtual path in the context of the current process, using a instance to capture output from the executed handler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `writer`参数通过引用传递给方法。The `writer` parameter is passed by reference to the method. 若要检索的输出的处理程序，在方法完成后，你使用的属性和方法的`writer`对象。To retrieve the output from the handler after the method completes, you use the properties and methods of the `writer` object. 有关示例，请参见 。For an example, see .

span.span: Always.

summary.span: 在派生类中实现时，使用指定 HTTP 方法、标头、路径和选项在指定的 URL 上异步执行该终结点，以保留窗体值和保留用户标识。

span.span: When implemented in a derived class, asynchronously executes the end point at the specified URL, using the specified HTTP method, headers, path, and options to preserve form values and preserve the user identity.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，对编码为仅包含在 URL 中有效的字符的字符串进行解码。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, decodes a string that was encoded to include only characters that are valid in a URL.

Always.

param.span: 要编码的字节数组。

span.span: The byte array to encode.

summary.span: 在派生类中重写时，使用 base64 数字将字节数组编码为等效的字符串表示形式，以便使其适用于 URL 的传输。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, encodes a byte array into an equivalent string representation by using base64 digits, which makes it usable for transmission on the URL.

returns.span: 如果 的长度大于 1，则为包含已编码数组的字符串；否则为空字符串 ("")

span.span: The string that contains the encoded array if the length of is greater than 1; otherwise, an empty string ("")
Always.
